name: Two Travellers
description:
A story set at a strange town which is always night with dreams of the citizens displayed at the wall of the buildings and one girl who lived inside it. The girl wandered around the town almost aimlessly until two travellers came to that town, both brought their own purposes. As the story went, each of the characters’ motive became clear including the girl herself.

Feature
  • 2 Routes + 1 Extra Story after completing one of the routes
  • 10 Endings (6 Bad Endings and 2 Endings for each route.)
  • 9 CG art
Cast
  • Heroine : A girl who lived all alone only with her cat in the strange town. Her real name will be revealed in one of the route and certain endings.
  • Cyrill : A mysterious traveller, his objective is unknown.
  • Haines : Another mysterious traveller.
Recommended Order

There are only 2 routes at this VN, but please play Haines' route first or there will be a missing scene at Cyrill's.

Credit

Art : drye

Story : QC
